name: Folt
description:
Flip tiles and match colors to move your way through more than 125 challenging levels in this beautiful, minimalist puzzle game.
Folt is completely free to play, but some in-game items require payment.

Folt features:
- Minimalist graphic design
- Gameplay that is easy to learn, but hard to master
- Over 125 levels with beautiful color schemes
- Different level types with a wide range of obstacles
- Powerups to help you beat the most difficult levels
